articles.title: I Never Saw Animatronics Like This: Epic Universe Team Reveals Challenges of Theme Park Tech - CNET
articles.description: Universal's new theme park pushes the boundaries of what's being done with animatronics today -- especially in extreme Florida heat. The design teams behind Epic Universe's attractions talk about bringing the tech to life and future stunts for guests (spoiler…
articles.content: I can't take my eyes off Dr. Victoria Frankenstein. I've seen plenty of theme park animatronics before, but as this robot moves fluidly in front of me, there's something otherworldly about how she wa… [+2745 chars]
